original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo aciravatiyā nadiyā vesiyāhi saddhiṁ naggā ekatitthe nahāyanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ aciravatiyāḥ nadiyāḥ vesiyāhi saddhim naggāḥ ekatitthe nahāyanti

original: “kiṁ nu kho nāma tumhākaṁ, ayye, daharānaṁ brahmacariyaṁ ciṇṇena, nanu nāma kāmā paribhuñjitabbā.
analyzed: kim nu kho nāma brahmacariyam ciṇṇena nanu nāma kāmā paribhuñjitabbā

original: Yadā jiṇṇā bhavissatha tadā brahmacariyaṁ carissatha.
analyzed: yadā jiṇṇāḥ bhavissatha tadā brahmacariyam carissatha

original: Evaṁ tumhākaṁ ubho atthā pariggahitā bhavissantī”ti.
analyzed: evam tumhākam ubho atthā pariggahitāḥ bhavissanti iti

original: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo upassayaṁ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ upassayam gantvā bhikkhunīnam etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññapessāmi dasa atthavase paṭicca—
analyzed: tena hi bhikkhave bhikkhunīnam sikkhāpadam paññapessāmi dasa atthavase paṭicca

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu
yā pana bhikkhunī naggā nahāyeyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: anivatthā vā apārutā vā nahāyati, payoge dukkaṭaṁ.
analyzed: anivatthā vā a pārutā vā nahāyati payoge dukkaṭa
acchinna cīvarikāya vā naṭṭha cīvarikāya vā
